item.title: This question could change the course of Trump’s trade war — if only we would ask it

item.title: AMC’s latest debt restructuring is good for the company, but bad for the stock
item.description: Shares of the movie-theater chain and original meme stock dropped as nearly 80 million common shares are exchanged for debt maturing in 2030.
